gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Test 1 : Test with minimal information (identifier, title, bounding box)
Test 3 : test proper support of 'kosteloos' tag, i.e. it should result in 'gratis-hergebruik' license.

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Test 4 : Dataset with Responsible Party 'owner' only

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Test 4 : test proper support of 'owner' responsible party only, i.e. it should map to extra:publisher.

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Test 5 : Dataset with Responsible Party 'publisher' only

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Test 5 : test proper support of 'publisher' responsible party only, i.e. it should map to extra:publisher.

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Test 6 : Dataset with 'owner' and 'publisher' Responsible Parties

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Test 6 : test proper support of 'publisher' and 'owner' responsible parties, i.e. 'publisher' should map to extra:publisher.

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Test 7 : Dataset with multiple Responsible Parties, as found in geopunt

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Test 7 : test proper support of many responsible parties, including a distributor. In particular, pointOfContact is placed in gmd:contact (not gmd:identificationInfo), and owner (to become publisher) has multiple roles.
